com.incors.plaf.alloy
Class AlloyCommonBorderFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonBorderFactory
public class AlloyCommonBorderFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods for creating various borders that match the Alloy Look&Feel.

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static AbstractCommonBorder createAlternativeToolBarButtonBorder()

          Creates a border that can be used for small buttons and toggle buttons (e.g. for usage in toolbars).

Constructor Detail

AlloyCommonBorderFactory

public AlloyCommonBorderFactory()
Method Detail

createSmallButtonBorder

public static AbstractCommonBorder createSmallButtonBorder()
Creates a border that can be used for small buttons and toggle buttons (e.g. for usage in toolbars). The advantage over the standard button border is that its corners consume less space.

createStandardComponentBorder

public static AbstractCommonBorder createStandardComponentBorder()
Creates a border that can be used for custom controls. This border is a slightly rounded rectangle with a subtle outer etching.

createAlternativeToolBarButtonBorder

public static AbstractCommonBorder createAlternativeToolBarButtonBorder()
Creates a border that can be used for buttons and toggle buttons located in a toolbar. The difference to the default border is that the border is always painted, not only during mouse rollover. This can improve visibility of buttons displaying text only.

To achieve a consistent look make sure that you do not mix buttons with the default border and buttons with the alternative toolbar button border in one toolbar.
